name: Cownado!
description:
Cownado! is back and better than ever before! Do you have what it takes to become a Cownado! master? This game is tough!

Cownado! offers a challenging yet rewarding game experience with a simple goal of keeping a cow in a spinning tornado!

Bounce your way to the top of the leaderboard, beat your friends, unlock six unique playable characters, trigger power-ups, and earn a handful of achievements while you’re at it!

Produced by Lynest Media

Feedback, suggestions, or bugs;
contact@lynestmedia.com
